import React from 'react' const AddPayment = (props) => { return (
Add payment:
Date:

Sum:

 

{(() => { if (props.paymentAdded === 1) { return ✓ Payment added } else if (props.paymentAdded === -1) { return ✗ An error occurred!; } else { return null; }})()}
)}; export default AddPayment;
